description: When the mountain world calls you: With the Innominata ML Hybrid Jacket, you're all set for your next hike across rugged landscapes or around blue lakes. The jacket is a combination of insulation and mid-layer – perfect for transitions or as an insulating layer on cold winter days. The back and arms are made from Polartec® Thermal Pro® fleece with 86% recycled polyester. The front features a recycled synthetic fiber insulation, the outer material is made from ultra-light Pertex® Quantum with 100% recycled polyester that has undergone a PFC-free DWR treatment. Two side pockets and a chest pocket offer easy-access storage space. Water and wind-repellent, incredibly lightweight and cozily warm. For intensive hikes.
name: Mammut Innominata ML Hybrid Jacket - Mens
